trans-unit.target: TEXT_CTSDDD3REWARD_00819_DD3ITEMSHOP_000_000<tab><blip> <buzz> Resources required for item synthesis.
TEXT_CTSDDD3REWARD_00819_DD3ITEMSHOP_000_010<tab><beep> Awakening from sleep mode. Awaiting orders.
TEXT_CTSDDD3REWARD_00819_Q1_000_020<tab>What will you do?
TEXT_CTSDDD3REWARD_00819_A1_000_021<tab>Exchange artifacts.
TEXT_CTSDDD3REWARD_00819_A1_100_021<tab>Exchange Orthos tomestones.
TEXT_CTSDDD3REWARD_00819_A1_000_022<tab>Request to keep your aetherpool gear.
TEXT_CTSDDD3REWARD_00819_A1_000_023<tab>Synthesize an Orthos aetherpool grip.
TEXT_CTSDDD3REWARD_00819_A1_000_024<tab>Learn more.
TEXT_CTSDDD3REWARD_00819_A1_000_025<tab>Nothing.
TEXT_CTSDDD3REWARD_00819_DD3ITEMSHOP_000_030<tab><bzzzt> Request denied. By Archmagus Noah's orders, aetherpool equipment must not be taken from the premises until she has given explicit approval.
TEXT_CTSDDD3REWARD_00819_SYSTEM_000_031<tab>You must first clear floor 30 and complete the subsequent quest in order to use aetherpool gear outside of Eureka Orthos.
TEXT_CTSDDD3REWARD_00819_DD3ITEMSHOP_000_040<tab><blip> <buzz> Functionality not yet implemented. Continue current task until upgrade is complete.
TEXT_CTSDDD3REWARD_00819_SYSTEM_000_041<tab>You must first clear floor 30 of Eureka Orthos and complete the subsequent quest in order to synthesize an Orthos aetherpool grip.

TEXT_CTSDDD3REWARD_00819_DD3ITEMSHOP_000_050<tab>Aether absorbed in battle may be used to stabilize aetherpool arms. However, the current amount of aether present in your equipment is insufficient for the operation.
TEXT_CTSDDD3REWARD_00819_SYSTEM_000_051<tab>In order to forge an aetherpool grip, both your aetherpool weapon and armor must have attained a minimum strength of +10.
TEXT_CTSDDD3REWARD_00819_DD3ITEMSHOP_000_052<tab><blip> <buzz> Large quantities of aether detected in equipment. Amount deemed sufficient to synthesize aetherpool grip.

TEXT_CTSDDD3REWARD_00819_Q2_000_053<tab>Synthesize an Orthos aetherpool grip? <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>※The strength of your aetherpool arm and armor will be reduced by 10.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_CTSDDD3REWARD_00819_Q3_000_060<tab>What will you ask?
TEXT_CTSDDD3REWARD_00819_A3_000_061<tab>What is there to be found in the laboratory?
TEXT_CTSDDD3REWARD_00819_A3_000_062<tab>Can aetherpool arms be used outside of the laboratory?
TEXT_CTSDDD3REWARD_00819_A3_000_063<tab>Nothing.

TEXT_CTSDDD3REWARD_00819_DD3ITEMSHOP_000_070<tab>Mistress Noah has created me for the sole purpose of synthesizing the resources found within Eureka Orthos. I am grateful for the role she has given me.

TEXT_CTSDDD3REWARD_00819_DD3ITEMSHOP_000_071<tab>Place any discarded experiments within me, and I will reconfigure them into something of use. Do not worry about organizing them beforehand─all matter is the same to me.
TEXT_CTSDDD3REWARD_00819_DD3ITEMSHOP_000_080<tab>The aetherpool equipment forged by Mistress Noah is imbued with wards that counteract Eureka Orthos's enervating magicks.

TEXT_CTSDDD3REWARD_00819_DD3ITEMSHOP_000_081<tab>However, these very same wards cause the equipment to become unstable without an opposing force, and aetherpool grips are required to make up for this deficiency.
TEXT_CTSDDD3REWARD_00819_SYSTEM_000_082<tab>To use your Orthos aetherpool weapon outside of Eureka Orthos, you must first forge Orthos aetherpool grips.
TEXT_CTSDDD3REWARD_00819_SYSTEM_000_083<tab>Forging one grip will reduce the strength of your Orthos aetherpool arm and armor by 10.
TEXT_CTSDDD3REWARD_00819_SYSTEM_000_084<tab>You must first clear floor 30 of Eureka Orthos and complete the subsequent quest in order to forge an Orthos aetherpool grip.
